name: Gruesome Gateau
description:
A terrific stomach-churning cake to mark our three years together. Grants 103% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Stacks.

name: Ghastly Gateau
description:
A spectacularly grim cake to mark our four years together. 1% tastier than a Gruesome Gateau. Grants 104% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Stacks.

name: Sacrificial Cake
description: A revolting cake that marks our five years together. The slightest taste fills you with an incomprehensible energy, reaching out to something beyond. Grants 105% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.Stacks.

name: Frightful Flan
description:
It may be a masquerade ball, but there is no masking the foul odor of this quivering yellow mass.

Consuming it, however, fills you with vigor.

Grants 106% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.Stacks.

name: Cursed Seed
description: Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 tangled hook and 1 tangled generator.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a tangled hook for the first time to earn bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, find and repair a tangled generator to earn bonus Bloodpoints.Using this offering increases the amount of Bloodpoints earned for these interactions.NOTE: During the event, 1 default tangled hook and 1 default tangled generator will spawn on the map.Stacks.Only playable during The Midnight Grove event.

name: Arcane Dowsing Rod
description:
Taps into the latent energy of The Entity's realm to find even more concentrated pockets of power.

PersonalProvides a +100% Bloodpoints bonus to event hooks, completed event generator repairs, and Void Energy transfers.Provides a directional cue when an Unstable Rift spawns within 24 meters.Only playable during the Haunted by Daylight event.

name: Pustula Petals
description: Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Blighted Hook and 1 Blighted Generator.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a Blighted Hook for the first time to earn bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, find and repair a Blighted Generator to earn bonus Bloodpoints.Using this offering increases the amount of Bloodpoints earned for these interactions.NOTE: During the event, 1 default Blighted Hook and 1 default Blighted Generator will spawn in the map.Stacks.Only playable during the Midnight Grove Event.

name: Red Envelope
description:
A gesture of generosity to bring good fortune to the unfortunate. Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Red Envelope in the trial.

The aura of your own envelope is revealed to you at the start of the trial.Interacting with your own Red Envelope reveals its aura to all other players in the trial until claimed.Opening another player's Red Envelope awards you with Bloodpoints of a random amount.When another player opens your envelope during the trial, you are awarded Bloodpoints and a cosmetic from the Moonlight Burrow collection.Increased Bloodpoints awarded from Lunar New Year Generators and Hooks.

This can only be canceled if four identical realm offerings are played.
